description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+15 vs. AC

Hit: 4d6 + 4 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ psychic, weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+15 vs. AC

Hit: 1d8 + 6 damage plus 1d8 + 3 psychic damage, and the target is marked until the end of the warrior's next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Ranged 6/12 (one creature)

+15 vs. AC

Hit: 2d6 + 4 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The warrior uses gythka and claw, or it uses chatkcha twice.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Effect: The warrior jumps 4 squares and then uses gythka. If the attack hits, the warrior slides the target 3 squares. Then the warrior jumps 3 squares and uses gythka again. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Close burst 2 (enemies in the burst)

+15 vs. Will

Hit: 4d6 + 4 psychic damage, and the target is marked until the end of the warrior's next turn.

Recharge when first bloodied

Move

Effect: The warrior jumps 7 squares. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy adjacent to the warrior and marked by the warrior moves, shifts, or makes an attack that does not include the warrior as a target.

Attack (Immediate Interrupt): Melee 1 (the triggering enemy)

+15 vs. Will

Hit: 2d6 + 3 damage, and the warrior knocks the target prone. The target is slowed until the end of the warrior's next turn.

HP 208; Bloodied 104Init +11 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 26Fort 23Ref 22Will 21
Speed 7
Ability ScoresStr 21 (+10)
Con 16 (+8)		Dex 18 (+9)
Int 10 (+5)		Wis 16 (+8)
Cha 12 (+6)
Languages Common, Thri-kreen
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Acrobatics +14, Athletics +15, Nature +13Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 18 | Insight 18

Equipment chatkcha x2, gythka .
